Package Components.Menu

Class MenuFactory

java.lang.Object
Components.Menu.MenuFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Config, Menus, Overviews, Queries
public class MenuFactory extends Object implements Menus
Controls the instantiation of Menu instances for this application.

    • showCurrent

      public Menu showCurrent()
      Prints the current Menu to the console and uses Input.expect(String) to get a response from the user.
      Returns:
      Menu
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no response is entered by the user.
